message:
SYSTEM: Muppets_2-_Language_Models.pptx: Diapositiva {23}
BERT is trained with pair of sentences and predict if the second is the subsequent
50% are subsequent pairs and 50% are random 
Uses special tokens for the classification. CLS at the beginning, and SEP at the end of each sentence 
CLS token is used to predict IsNext/NotNext
speaker: SYSTEM
